CDeadSourceList::CDeadSource::CDeadSource ( uint32  ID,
uint16  Port,
uint32  ServerIP,
uint16  KadPort 
)

Constructor.

Parameters:
ID The IP/ID of the recorded client.
Port The TCP port of the recorded client.
ServerIP The ip of the connected server.
KadPort The Kad port used by the client.

Notes: * ID must be specified. * Either KadPort or Port must be specified. * For lowid sources, ServerIP must be specified.

References m_ID, m_KadPort, m_Port, m_ServerIP, and m_TimeStamp.
